nodes.text: Very well, but I guarantee success! If you want to get in on the riches just waiting, come back soon, or I will find  another partner!
You see Hernandez, the rascally gambler.
So, you think you have tumbled to me, eh? Well, you won't  get anything from me!
Sorry, mi amigo. Hey, let me show you a neat game . . .
My friend, I hate to impose, but perhaps you could assist me. I have developed a sure-fire system, because I have discovered how Gizmo runs his tables, but I do not have the caps to play.
Oye, muchacho, allow me to introduce myself. I am Hernandez, a man of mucho gusto! You look like you are new here. Please, allow me to be your informant to the casino.
You obviously don't share Gizmo's brilliance. This place is a respite from the harshness of everyday life.
But of course! This fine establishment is run by the famous Gizmo. A true visionary and a very wealthy  man.
My system is developing slowly. I have living expenses and such, you know, but it is working!
My friend, I see you are a man of much taste, as well. Perhaps a simple game of dice?
Gizmo had a dream of setting up a place where people could meet and enjoy themselves. He had the ambition to make it happen. The result is the casino you see here.

Well, Gizmo runs a pretty good house, although the games are, how shall we say, rather weighted towards the house. It's not like his dealers cheat, though. But unless you have a system, like me, you will need to be very clever.
Buenos dias, my friend! What can I do for you today?
Perhaps you can spare a few caps? I guarantee success. [You get the feeling that he's trying to scam you.]
Thank you very much, mi amigo! In a few days I shall be able to pay you back, with interest. My system is slow, you see, it requires much patience, but it will most certainly reap  great profits!

links.text: I think you're lying. You're trying to scam me.
Can you tell me about the casino?
What are the odds like on the games here?
You say Gizmo is a visionary. What's his vision?
I think that you are a liar and a cheat. Where's my money?
No, thanks, I'd rather try something else.
No, thanks, I'd rather try something else.
Life's hard enough. I don't trust the motives of someone who would encourage people to lose their money.
I think you're lying. You're trying to scam me.
